Address.value: NO. 473 GUANSHAN AVENUE,20TH FLOOR, BUILDING A, WUHAN, 430073, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: DouYu International Holdings Ltd is a game-centric live streaming platform in China. The company operates its platform on both PC and mobile apps, through which users can enjoy immersive and interactive games and entertainment live streaming. It generates revenues through live streaming and advertisement.
